Hey guys! 

Special Christmas Deal! $3 a month for a VPS with these specs:

[**Christmas Special**
](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?gid=6)
o Server CPU - AMD Phenom II x6 1045t (4 cores)
o Management: Unmanaged
o Hard Disk - 60 GB
o Dedicated RAM - 256MB DDR3
o vSwap RAM - 256MB DDR3
o Traffic Per Month - 500 GB
o Dedicated IP - 1 IP
o Network Connection - 1 Gbit
o Location: USA
Only $2.99/monthly [$8.97 - Quarterly Required]
[**Order Now**
](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?gid=6)

We currently only accept Paypal.

These servers use OpenVZ virtualization and use the SolusVM control panel. These are unmanaged however if technical issues arise we will do our best to help you. They are located in the USA, so anything violating the laws of the United States is prohibited.

If any questions arise you can open a ticket or send an email to me at support@reversehosts.com.
